name: The Key Collector Roomba
description:
You've been assigned to collect all the keys kept inside the gold vault, and the gold you collect along the way will be your pay. But remember, don't be greedy! Grab as little coins as you can. The less you grab the better! Less is more! ... or something.

Controls:
  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Skip dialogue: Space
  • Restart: R

Submission to Blackthornprod Game Jam #3
